name: Ironclad Berserker
description: A towering warrior clad in battle-scarred plate armor wielding a massive two-handed axe. His beard is braided with iron rings and his eyes burn with primal fury.
flavor_text: The mountain trembles before his rage.

name: Shadowblade Assassin
description: A lithe figure wrapped in dark leather and silk, with twin curved daggers at her sides. Her face is partially concealed by a hood revealing only piercing violet eyes.
flavor_text: Death walks silently in her footsteps.

name: Stormcaller Mage
description: An elderly wizard with a long silver beard and robes crackling with electric energy. Lightning dances between his fingertips as he grips an ornate staff.
flavor_text: Thunder bows to his command.

name: Blood Knight Paladin
description: A grim warrior in crimson armor wielding a blessed sword that glows with holy fire. Battle scars cross his weathered face like a map of past victories.
flavor_text: Salvation through sacrifice, victory through blood.

name: Frostbite Ranger
description: A skilled archer with ice-blue eyes and frost-touched hair, wearing hide armor adorned with wolf pelts. Her longbow gleams with magical ice crystals.
flavor_text: Winter's arrow never misses its mark.

name: Earthshaker Barbarian
description: A massive warrior with ritual tattoos covering his muscled frame, wielding a war hammer that seems carved from living stone. His roar can split mountains.
flavor_text: The earth itself is his weapon.

name: Nimble Duelist
description: An elegant swordsman in fine clothing with a rapier at his side. His movements are fluid like water and his smile is as sharp as his blade.
flavor_text: Grace in motion, death in precision.

name: Phoenix Warrior
description: A fierce female fighter wreathed in flames, her armor forged from phoenix feathers. Her eyes burn like embers and her sword ignites with each swing.
flavor_text: From ashes, she rises stronger.

name: Moonlight Sentinel
description: A graceful guardian in silver mail with a crescent-shaped shield and a spear that gleams like moonbeams. Her pale skin seems to glow in darkness.
flavor_text: Night's eternal protector stands vigilant.

name: Venomstrike Rogue
description: A deadly assassin with emerald eyes and daggers coated in toxic poison. Her movements are serpentine and her smile promises a painful end.
flavor_text: One cut is all she needs.

name: Thunderfist Monk
description: A disciplined martial artist with shaved head and robes bearing storm symbols. His fists crackle with electrical energy as he assumes fighting stance.
flavor_text: Body and spirit united in thunder.

name: Bladedancer Warrior
description: An agile fighter who moves like a deadly ballet dancer, dual-wielding curved swords. Her hair flows like silk as she spins through combat.
flavor_text: Death is her dance partner.

name: Grimward Defender
description: A stalwart shield-bearer in heavy armor marked with protective runes. His tower shield bears the scars of a thousand battles.
flavor_text: None shall pass while he draws breath.

name: Wildheart Druid
description: A nature warrior with bark-like skin and leaves in her hair, wielding a staff carved from ancient oak. Vines wrap around her arms like living armor.
flavor_text: Nature's fury given mortal form.

name: Crystalshard Battlemage
description: A hybrid warrior-mage whose armor is embedded with glowing crystals. Arcane energy flows through his sword as he weaves spells with each strike.
flavor_text: Magic and steel in perfect harmony.

name: Oathbreaker Knight
description: A fallen paladin in blackened armor, his sword wreathed in dark energy. His eyes glow with unholy light as shadows writhe around his form.
flavor_text: Honor abandoned for power eternal.

name: Starfall Archer
description: An elven marksman whose arrows shimmer with celestial light. Her bow was crafted from meteorite and her aim is guided by the stars themselves.
flavor_text: Each arrow carries heaven's judgment.

name: Bonecrusher Champion
description: A massive gladiator wielding a spiked maul, his body covered in ritual scars and victory marks. His presence alone intimidates lesser warriors.
flavor_text: Victory is written in his scars.

name: Soulreaper Necromancer
description: A dark spellcaster in tattered robes commanding undead minions. Her eyes are hollow voids and death energy radiates from her skeletal staff.
flavor_text: Life is but a fleeting inconvenience.

name: Windstrider Scout
description: A swift reconnaissance warrior with feathers braided in her hair and wind magic flowing around her form. Her speed defies mortal understanding.
flavor_text: Swift as the storm wind.
